mapper.select: /* SmsSendHistMapper.getAddresseeDtlList */ SELECT A.PHONE_NUMBER, B.ADDR, B.SALE_DATE FROM --SMS전송 팝업 ( SELECT * FROM ( ( --SMS SELECT SUBSTR(SBPENC.D(A.DEST_INFO), INSTR(SBPENC.D(A.DEST_INFO), '^')+1) AS PHONE_NUMBER FROM SDK_SMS_SEND_ENC A WHERE 1=1 AND A.RESERVED9 = #{smsSendSeq} --SMS_SEND_SEQ ) UNION ALL ( --LMS SELECT SUBSTR(SBPENC.D(A.DEST_INFO), INSTR(SBPENC.D(A.DEST_INFO), '^')+1) AS PHONE_NUMBER FROM SDK_MMS_SEND_ENC A WHERE 1=1 AND A.RESERVED9 = #{smsSendSeq} --SMS_SEND_SEQ ) UNION ALL ( --SMS 문자 전송결과 SELECT SUBSTR(A.DEST_INFO, INSTR(A.DEST_INFO, '^')+1) AS PHONE_NUMBER FROM SDK_SMS_REPORT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.RESERVED9 = #{smsSendSeq} --SMS_SEND_SEQ ) UNION ALL ( --LMS 문자 전송결과 SELECT SUBSTR(A.DEST_INFO, INSTR(A.DEST_INFO, '^')+1) AS PHONE_NUMBER FROM SDK_MMS_REPORT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.RESERVED9 = #{smsSendSeq} --SMS_SEND_SEQ ) ) ) A, --마케팅용SMS전송 ( SELECT SUBSTR(SBPENC.D(sssemr.DEST_INFO), INSTR(SBPENC.D(sssemr.DEST_INFO), '^')+1) AS PHONE_NUMBER, (sssemr.ADDR || ' ' || sssemr.ADDR_DTL) AS ADDR, sssemr.SALE_DATE FROM SDK_SMS_SEND_ENC_MEMBER_READY sssemr WHERE 1=1 AND sssemr.SMS_SEND_SEQ = #{smsSendSeq} ) B WHERE 1=1 AND B.PHONE_NUMBER (+)= A.PHONE_NUMBER
